skillTree.localised_description: Abhorash's battle with the Imperial Dragon granted more than just a cure for hunger...
True followers of the path, many of these blood knights have been woth Abhorash since the begining.

skillTree.localised_description: Whereby the power of death itself is used to hold back the physical world.
Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +20%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +35%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +50%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: It's An Endless Abyss
There is nothing but utter belief. There is no reasoning with this one.
"Don't look into their eyes, there is only death there!"
Such is this one's conviction that others have no choice but to believe.
Speaking words of power or faith can alter perceptions on the battlefield.
This one will not go down easily  it will be necessary to break both the will and the body first.
An omen, a sign - this being knows things and any who follow will share their glory.
Never to be broken or dishonoured  never to succumb to the foe.
This one fights with a fervour to be both admired and despised.
A hybrid of familar and new magics, the disiples of abhorash have new and powerful tools to stay in the fight.

skillTree.localised_description: The pent up rage amassed over the centuries, given manifest through the will and blood of the first of blood knights.

ui_effects.localised_text: Requires line of sight to the target
Requires line of sight to the target

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Distilled Wrath"

skillTree.localised_description: Made to embrace vampirism through deceipt, only final anguished breaths of the dying dragon could give final release from the ever present hunger.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Anguished Breath"

skillTree.localised_description: Many mortal champions change their attitude when their proud challenge is accepted by a dark creature whose very eyes are the eyes of death
Abhorash's travels have brought him to all lands where exotic and new spells and combat forms could be learned

effects.description: Overcast Spell: "Wall of Crimson Death Upgraded"
Overcast Spell: "Wall of Crimson Death Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Wall of Crimson Death"

skillTree.localised_description: Calling on the new strength taken from the dying drake, Abhorash summons a barrage of firey death.

effects.description: Overcast Spell: "Rain of Firey Blood Upgraded"
Overcast Spell: "Rain of Firey Blood Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Rain of Firey Blood"

skillTree.localised_description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.
A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.localised_description: Those in the army can find succour or be replenished by the power of this champion.

Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 6%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 9%

skillTree.localised_description: The locals take notice and will be inspired or frightened into action.

Spread Corruption action: Vampiric corruption is increased by an additional 2
Spread Corruption action: Vampiric corruption is increased by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of a powerful figure extolling death and blasphemies can bring enemy ranks to their knees.

effects.description: Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -10%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -20%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -40%

skillTree.localised_description: They cannot stop what they cannot see.

effects.description: Damage Walls action: 1 additional wall breaches

skillTree.localised_description: Whether it be training harder, travelling lighter, eating less or sleeping better, there's always a way to draw more from the day.

effects.description: Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 5%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 10%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text:
Undead units cannot be routed, but take damage when their Leadership is broken.
	
	Undead units also have:
	 Fear and Terror Immunity
	
	Undead units may also have their hit points restored by special characters such as the Vampire Counts Necromancer.
This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.
Even when performing the most fatiguing actions, this unit never loses vigour.
When attacking braced charge defenders, this unit only loses half of its charge bonus
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with time spent engaged in melee.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

backgroundSkills.localised_description: The Eternal Wanderer returns from his long to aid his childeren in their time of need.
